summary:
Russia, officially the Russian Federation, is the largest country globally, spanning Eastern Europe and North Asia. It has a long history, dating back to the East Slavs in the 3rd century. The country's capital is Moscow, and it has a rich cultural heritage, with Saint Petersburg as its cultural center.

Russia was once part of the Soviet Union but became an independent federation in 1991. It has a powerful military and is a permanent member of the UN Security Council. Despite democratic setbacks, Russia remains a significant global power with a strong economy, primarily driven by its natural resources.
title: Russia
